item.title: Cloud Service Architecture for NLP in Google Cloud
item.author: Author
item.description: The technological advance, forces the sustainability of the companies in order to adapt and compete Summary This academic article was developed through my postgraduate course, DAT-03 Data Analysis in Big Data Environments, which presents a business case in which a company is interested in combining and migrating relational databases in Microsoft SQL Server and Oracle DB. Given the need to feed them with an NLP system output of social networks such as Instagram, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger.
